claim: Thomas DeSimone was in a gang.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Thomas Anthony DeSimone  (  May 24 , 1950 -- disappeared January 14 , 1979  )  , also known as Two-Gun Tommy or Tommy D , was a Sicilian-American gangster and associate of the Lucchese crime family in New York City .

claim: Thomas DeSimone was in a gang.
premise_source_doc_sentence: DeSimone was a grandson and nephew of Los Angeles mob bosses Rosario DeSimone and Frank DeSimone , respectively .

claim: Thomas DeSimone was in a gang.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was married to Angelica `` Cookie '' Spione , but had many mistresses , including Theresa Ferrara .

premise_source_doc_sentence: In Martin Scorsese 's film Goodfellas , the character Tommy DeVito  (  portrayed by Joe Pesci  )  is based on DeSimone .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Frank DeSimone 's well-known nephew , Thomas DeSimone , was an enforcer for the Lucchese crime family .
